name: Willy The Wisp
description:
Pitch: Willy the wisp is a top view game in which you embody a little ghost who wants to protect is manor. You have to scare the thieves and make them run away before they catch your treasure.

How to play:

Move with keft stick
Action with A (open light, hold object)
Scare with X
Enchant with B

Tips:
Try to combine the effect of the light with your scare power.
You can enchant some objects in the manor to transform them in deadly traps.
